CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: ‘Add emoji’ updated keyboard shortcut
CurrentVersion.description: Insert emojis directly from your keyboard without any distractions. Use colons (e.g. :smile:) in the compose box to add any emoji, even your custom ones, making it quicker to express yourself.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Campaign Enhancements - Targeted campaigns and campaigns in the digest.
CurrentVersion.description: Corporate communications and campaign managers will now have the capability to effectively promote their campaigns by sending notifications directly to users, ensuring they are promptly informed about new campaigns and can readily participate in them. Additionally, campaigns will be discoverable in the engage digest, enhancing visibility and engagement opportunities.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Campaign Enhancements - Targeted campaigns and campaigns in the digest.
OldVersion.description: Corporate communications and campaign managers will now have the capability to effectively promote their campaigns by sending notifications directly to users, ensuring they are promptly informed about new campaigns and can readily participate in them. Additionally, campaigns will be discoverable in the engage digest, enhancing visibility and engagement opportunities.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Support S/MIME in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: New Outlook for Windows will support S/MIME (Secure/Multipurpose Internet Mail extensions) signing and encryption. All new and existing S/MIME configurations will work without any explicit action from admins. The feature was already available for Web and now we are extending its availability to New Outlook. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Support S/MIME in the new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: New Outlook for Windows will support S/MIME (Secure/Multipurpose Internet Mail extensions) signing and encryption. All new and existing S/MIME configurations will work without any explicit action from admins. The feature was already available for Web and now we are extending its availability to New Outlook. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Video creation in Copilot Visual Creator powered by Clipchamp
CurrentVersion.description: Clipchamp brings video creation skills to Visual Creator in Copilot. Type your prompt and Clipchamp will write a bespoke script, source high quality stock footage, and assemble a video project with music, voiceover, text overlays and transitions. Open your video project draft in Clipchamp app to continue editing, export and share. Great for informational videos, video messaging, how-to, demo and video presentations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Video creation in Copilot Visual Creator powered by Clipchamp
OldVersion.description: Clipchamp brings video creation skills to Visual Creator in Copilot. Type your prompt and Clipchamp will write a bespoke script, source high quality stock footage, and assemble a video project with music, voiceover, text overlays and transitions. Open your video project draft in Clipchamp app to continue editing, export and share. Great for informational videos, video messaging, how-to, demo and video presentations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Vote on and archive Questions in Teams Q&A
CurrentVersion.description: Question voting allows instance participants to upvote the most important questions and sort by highest votes or recent activity. This gives moderators the ability to derive insights from the audience about what topics they care the most about and address them. Additionally, for questions that might be outdated or irrelevant, moderators can move them to a separate feed to ensure that presenters can focus on providing the most value to attendees.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Vote on and archive Questions in Teams Q&A
OldVersion.description: Question voting allows instance participants to upvote the most important questions and sort by highest votes or recent activity. This gives moderators the ability to derive insights from the audience about what topics they care the most about and address them. Additionally, for questions that might be outdated or irrelevant, moderators can move them to a separate feed to ensure that presenters can focus on providing the most value to attendees.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Space analytics with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: In space analytics, use Copilot to analyze and explain key data points and trends in your space utilization graphs. It compares current utilization metrics such as occupancy, desk usage, and room bookings against previous time periods (e.g. last month, last quarter), highlighting important changes and trends.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Space analytics with Copilot
OldVersion.description: ?In space analytics, use Copilot to analyze and explain key data points and trends in your space utilization graphs. It compares current utilization metrics such as occupancy, desk usage, and room bookings against previous time periods (e.g. last month, last quarter), highlighting important changes and trends.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Teams now available for multitenant organizations
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot is available to users in a multitenant organization, provided the user has an active Copilot license in their host tenant.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Teams now available for multitenant organizations
OldVersion.description: Copilot is available to users in a multitenant organization, provided the user has an active Copilot license in their host tenant.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Edit and schedule polls
CurrentVersion.description:
Users can schedule a poll for publication in Engage. Users can also edit a poll prior to publication, though once published, a poll is not editable.

This change brings the edit and schedule capability to polls, like all other post types in Engage (discussion, question, praise, and article).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Edit and schedule polls
OldVersion.description:
Users can schedule a poll for publication in Engage. Users can also edit a poll prior to publication, though once published, a poll is not editable.

This change brings the edit and schedule capability to polls, like all other post types in Engage (discussion, question, praise, and article).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Auto detection of room audio in BYOD rooms expanded to audio devices with video
CurrentVersion.description: The room audio auto-detect and pre-select feature for BYOD rooms that was released in October 2024 now activates the video component of composite audio-video peripherals as the selected camera in Teams.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Auto detection of room audio in BYOD rooms expanded to audio devices with video
OldVersion.description: The room audio auto-detect and pre-select feature for BYOD rooms that was released in October 2024 now activates the video component of composite audio-video peripherals as the selected camera in Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Forward messages with app cards
CurrentVersion.description: Messages containing app cards in chats and channels can now be forwarded. To use, navigate to the more actions menu of any message containing an app card, and select "Forward".

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Forward messages with app cards
OldVersion.description: Messages containing app cards in chats and channels can now be forwarded. To use, navigate to the more actions menu of any message containing an app card, and select "Forward".

CurrentVersion.title: Bookings: New Queue experience in Bookings to manage appointments for the day with real time attendee wait status and SMS reminders
CurrentVersion.description: The new Queue experience in Bookings enables schedulers and Bookings users to view the status and monitor all scheduled in-person and virtual appointments. Users can quickly create or view an appointment and send staff and attendees email reminders and SMS text notifications.

OldVersion.title: Bookings: New Queue experience in Bookings to manage appointments for the day with real time attendee wait status and SMS reminders
OldVersion.description: The new Queue experience in Bookings enables schedulers and Bookings users to view the status and monitor all scheduled in-person and virtual appointments. Users can quickly create or view an appointment and send staff and attendees email reminders and SMS text notifications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improvements to the transcription experience in meetings
CurrentVersion.description: We’re making improvements to enhance the transcription experience in meetings. First, when transcription, recording, or Copilot are enabled before or during the meeting, users will be prompted to select the spoken language to ensure transcription accuracy. Second, when transcription is enabled (whether by itself or when recording or Copilot are enabled) only the meeting organizer, co-organizers, and transcript initiator will be able to change the spoken language. Next, we’re simplifying the settings by creating a new settings page for meeting spoken language and translation language for live translated captions at Caption settings > Language settings > Meeting spoken language and transcript found at Transcript > Language settings > Meeting spoken language.  Lastly, when participants speak a language that doesn’t match the selected language in the spoken language setting, the meeting organizer, co-organizer and initiator will get a notification that the language is mismatched.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Only meeting organizers, co-organizers, and transcript initiator can change spoken language setting
OldVersion.description: We’re changing the default permissions for who can set the spoken language for a meeting. Now, when transcription is enabled (whether by itself or when recording or Copilot are enabled) only the meeting organizer, co-organizer, and person who initiated the transcript can change the spoken language for the meeting. This is to ensure accurate transcription of everyone’s speech during the meeting since the spoken language setting and the spoken language used during discussion must match for transcript accuracy. If transcription is not enabled, all meeting participants will be able to change the meeting spoken language.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams:  Queues App – adding Service level for Realtime stats
CurrentVersion.description: Service level is now available as part of Queues App realtime stats. Authorized users will be able to review the Service level metric and adjust staffing accordingly.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams:  Queues App – adding Service level for Realtime stats
OldVersion.description: Service level is now available as part of Queues App realtime stats. Authorized users will be able to review the Service level metric and adjust staffing accordingly.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: open attachments while offline in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: We are adding more functionality to offline mode in the new Outlook for Windows. You will now be able to open and save attachments from your email without an internet connection. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: open attachments while offline in the new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: We are adding more functionality to offline mode in the new Outlook for Windows. You will now be able to open and save attachments from your email without an internet connection. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Distribute from SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: We are bringing Amplify capabilities to SharePoint. Soon, you will be able to share your Pages to multiple channels using Amplify without needing to navigate away from SharePoint. You will receive the in-depth Amplify reporting on these pages.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ad-hoc individual desk booking in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: While previously able to reserve a spot within a desk pool, now you can book an individual desk when plugging into a shared desk peripheral. In addition, IT admins can get valuable individual desk utilization data in the Teams Rooms Pro Management portal making flexible work environments better for users and IT. This feature requires a Teams Premium license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ad-hoc individual desk booking in Teams
OldVersion.description: While previously able to reserve a spot within a desk pool, now you can book an individual desk when plugging into a shared desk peripheral. In addition, IT admins can get valuable individual desk utilization data in the Teams Rooms Pro Management portal making flexible work environments better for users and IT. This feature requires a Teams Premium license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Insider risk management user analytics
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, Insights will be generated for potentially risky behaviors at a user level and will be surfaced across the following experiences: 1) Insider risk management context in DLP alert investigation 2) Insider risk management context in Communication compliance alert investigation 3) Insider risk management context in Microsoft Defender XDR user entity page 4) Advanced hunting in Microsoft Defender XDR. User analytics will cover all eligible users in the tenant including users not in the scope of any Insider risk management policy. During the initial rollout, user analytics will be enabled by default for all customers who have enabled Insider risk management analytics. This will help customers benefit from this additional intelligence right from the start. Customers can enable/disable user analytics in your tenant from Insider risk management Global settings. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Admin units support for SharePoint Online
CurrentVersion.description: Delegate management and remediation authority for different people in different regions or organization units with role-based access control (RBAC). For example, German investigators should be able to investigate alerts and audit events for only German users. This update extends support to SharePoint for Microsoft 365.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Add CVI Coordinates to Townhall and webinar invites
CurrentVersion.description: With CVI coordinates in invites, now non-Teams users—such as external customers or partners—can easily join Teams Townhall and webinar meetings using a third-party teleconferencing device.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to separate out the Townhall attendee invites
CurrentVersion.description: This backend change will now address the 'separation of attendee' invites from the events crew. This feature allows the organizers of Townhalls to maintain separate invites for attendees.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Townhall Attendee/Presenter email dial in details.
CurrentVersion.description: With the release of this feature, the Townhall attendee and presenter invites will have dial in details available in the body of the email.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Wired headset support for Walkie Talkie on iOS.
CurrentVersion.description: This feature adds the wired support to Walkie Talkie on iOS. It adds support for both specialized PTT headsets and generic headsets.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - General availability of Microsoft partner data connectors for T-Mobile and HKCSL
CurrentVersion.description: These connectors will support ingestion for T-Mobile and HKCSL data to user mailboxes and makes them available for compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Sensitivity labels
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Amplify will support sending mail with sensitivity.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: ‘Add emoji’ updated keyboard shortcut
CurrentVersion.description: Insert emojis directly from your keyboard without any distractions. Use colons (e.g. :smile:) in the compose box to add any emoji, even your custom ones, making it quicker to express yourself.
